mapper.select: select review_num, review_subject, id, input_date from(select r.review_num, r.review_subject, m.id, r.input_date, row_number() over(order by r.review_num desc) rnum from review r, member m where r.member_num=m.member_num and ${ column_name } = #{ column_value }) where rnum between #{ start_num } and #{ end_num }
mapper.delete: delete from review where review_num = #{ review_num }
